about_the_game:
The Anthropocene has ended.
Humanity did not survive the Threshold.
We are the inheritors of their ruin.

Project Silverfish is a non-linear, Immersive Sim, FPS focused on realistic gun-play, exploration and intuitive problem solving.

Venture deep into a hostile and mysterious exclusion zone to hunt powerful artifacts, fight horrifying creatures and dive deep into hidden dungeons!
Work to uncover the dark secrets of your people's origins, and humanity's extinction...

Play with a massive set of diverse weapons and tools!
Interact with several distinct factions, all with their own goals and agendas.
Explore a large, semi-open world as one of 6 playable classes!


In this free demo, experience a small slice of what the full game will have to offer!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features:
Gun-related violence.
Physical violence.
Police/military violence.
Strong language.
Strong political themes.
Politically motivated violence.
Mild nudity.
Mild sexual themes.
Cartoon blood and gore.
Cartoon bodily decomposition.
Depictions of alcohol use.
Depictions of drug use.
Violence towards animals.
Images and sounds meant to disorient and discomfort the user.
